metadata.description:
"World War II is the stage for an all-new battle in the Assassins' Quest! 

The self-contained adventure of a brand new Assassin told in two astounding double-sized issues!

In the depths of World War II, fresh Assassin Eddie Gorm uncovers Templar plans to create a devastating new weapon at the dawn of the atomic age.

The fires of Blitz-era London are brought to vivid life by artist Jean-Baptiste Hostache."
metadata.name: Assassin's Creed: Conspiracies
